Actions.Name: Masamune
Actions.Effects: Slash foe with a mortal wound. If they attack during their next turn, they take 6 damage.
Actions.Exceed: Also apply Muramasa's effect to the foe.

Combo.Name: Muramasa
Combo.Effects: Slash foe with a mortal wound. If they move during their next turn, they take 6 damage.
Combo.Exceed: Also apply Masamune's effect to the foe.

Actions.Name: Hone
Actions.Description: The next attack from this character deals maximum damage and triggers all exceed effects.

Actions.Name: Cut Through
Actions.AreaEffect: 3 damage. The [name] may teleport to any point on the line after this ability resolves.

Actions.Name: Duelist's Fervor
Actions.AreaEffect: The [name] marks a foe in range 3. While the foe is marked and in range 2, the [name] has evasion and deals bonus damage with all abilities against that foe. The foe can end this mark by hitting the [name] with an attack.
